categories: Category:Star Wars: The Old Republic voice actors

nodes.text: Robert Pine is an American actor. He voiced Orgus Din and additional voices in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic.

Pine is best known for his role as Sgt. Joseph Getraer in the television series CHiPs. He was also involved in a number of films and television including Days of Our Lives, Star Trek: Enterprise, Red Eye (2005), Lakeview Terrace (2008), and Frozen.
